New policy

Policies

Policies are a group of votes which, taken together, indicate a particular stance on an issue. You can research and create your own.

  • For marriage equality 1 division

  • For offshore processing 2 divisions (1 unedited)

Provisional policies

  • For provisional policies 1 division (1 unedited)

That makes 3 policies which have voted in at least one division.
